WHAT'S IN THE GME

Year 3022,

Two friends think about starting something exciting. After planning about many things, they ended up setting up an Inter galactic Command force. Together they made a good team, defeated many super villains. One fine day, they planned to defeat the Curch of Satan .

They went on with their battle, Chelenoz was completely prepared for the battle and was all done with his work and they started the WAR. 

But Gchnhym's intentions were different. And he planned to tie up with the superior of planet Satan. All this was happening with out the Chelenoz's knowledge. They had a great war and Chelenoz was going to have the victory, but then there came an unexpected attack from Gchnhym and due to that Chelenoz was defeated and the Curch of Satan decided to execute him but then Gchnhym decided to spare him but throw him out of the ship to die.

FROM THE DEV

B-TRAYAL is a 2d platformer, shooter, where you role-play as CHELENOZ, who has been betrayed by his best friend, companion, GCHNHYM. Sling, dash and time stab through the levels to help Chelenoz defeat Gchnhym.

  • Small but distinct variety of enemies.
  • 5 different abilities and some hidden ones to find.
  • 5 levels totally different from one another.
  • Plenty of secrets to find out.

The controls are easy and pretty straight forward. They are taught in game and exist in the game world.  

THIS GAME HAS BEEN CREATED WITH UNITY.

Assist Mode

Re-introducing ASSIST MODE, where in you can completely tackle the game's difficulty with different options to alter the way of your playing. The ASSIST MODE can be found in the PAUSE MENU -> OPTIONS, under the ASSIST SETTINGS. 

The use of ASSIST MODE is not recommended, it is only for people who find the game unusually harder. Still, it is recommended that you play the game as intended by the developers.

  • More Health Recovery - Generally, the health does not regenerate and the energy regenerates till 30 points, but with this toggle on, 40% of your health and energy will be regenerated.
  • No Gun Recoil - There will be no recoil on shooting.
  •  Energy Point Conservation - Less to NO energy will be spent.  
  • Lower Reload Time - Less than usual reload time
  • Spike Protection - Less damage on collision with spikes
  • Double Dash - After acquiring dash, you can Dash Twice while Air borne.
